thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 10 of 227
thread.title: Dana V Cosby
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Dana V Cosby

author: Dana V Cosby
title: Dana V Cosby
text: Overall my experience with the sales team and customer service was good. There was a glitch though with my lamps first being on backorder and one arriving defective. I didn't notice until a week later after delivery but they were quick in resolving the matter and got a new one delivered the next day to me. Now that is awesome customer service!
